channel.title: Please Help Me Making A Server!
channel.description: ~PLEASE HELP!~ I was reading a topic on Servers and i want to make my own. I came to a point in the guide where it says I need a router/ i need to go to a router and do all this stuff. Please help me because i don't know what this is. Help appreciated!!

item.title: Please Help Me Making A Server!
item.dc:creator: @Spider1 -Spider-
item.description:
@Spider1 wrote:

To Get Youre Own Server You Go To The Download List On Server Downloads On Home Page Then Download 1 … You Will Need WinRar … To Extract The .rar File Into A Folder Which You Then Click That File And There Is Youre Server … Next Bit You Need Like A Router To Connect To Youre Server A Router Is A Box Which Allows You To Connect To The Internet. Then U Click … Start … Run … Type In Cmd … It Should Say … Ip Adress You Right That Down And Then Open Youre Browser And Type In www.whatismyip.com … Then Right That Down … Then Type The Ip You Got From The Website www.whatismyip.com. Then A Box Will Apear Asking For UserName And Pass Which Is On The Router Box Or Underneath The Router. When You Typed That Info In A Page Will Display Giving You Info About Youre Router … Click The Tab On The Side Saying … Port Forwarding … And Add A Mopar Name … Eg … MyServer … Then Type In The Rest Of The Info Where It Says Ip You Type The Ip Adress You Got From … Run … Cmd … Then Click Add. Now Go To Youre Server And Press RunServer.Bat … Open Youre Moparscape Client And Log In With The Ip You Got From … Run … Cmd … Then … Go To www.no-ip.com … Register And Add A MoparServer Name Eg. Gangscape.no-ip.info And Click Add … Then Go To Moparscape Server List And Add Youre Server … Eg. Gangscape … Server ip … Gangscape.no-ip.info…

And Ding Dang Do It Should Work…

//-Spider-

Need Any Help Add … Spider--2k7--@hotmail.co.uk

Read full topic
